documents.document: @chakraqueen One nil, Lewis with the only goal and I cop the lot! First, last and anytime scorer! Am signing off now. Enjoy the game
I'm ever so sorry to bore ya With my tale of an anytime scorer I've unloaded a chunk And bet it on Dunk And I'll probably end up much poorer
@ou_tis @MontyCFT People in Horsham used to call us penguins when we went into town on Saturdays. No idea why https://t.co/m4gI0Kqw9d

@MontyCFT But ... are collies smarter than penguins?
#Subtweet
"If you don't believe in the same sky fairy as us we are formally putting you on notice" Sean Spicer https://t.co/ubTOMsT8y6
@MontyCFT Well I'm inclined to believe you seeing as Collies are the most intelligent breed.
I really don't get this Hockney thing. Did he think the S*n demographic were now going to rush out and stock up on prints of The Splash?
@Baddiel Some of those early albums are gorgeous. He was great live too. My pals band supported him on tour in '86. What a character.

I've done my absolute conkers on the cricket.

@RowleyfileRRR Hehe, I often lose more than that in an hour. You'll manage without 'em somehow Simon.
